name: iPhone 12
description: The latest iPhone 12 model with a Super Retina XDR display, A14 Bionic chip, and 5G capability.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The latest Samsung Galaxy S21 model with a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 5G capability, and a 64 MP camera.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: The latest Sony PlayStation 5 model with an ultra-high-speed SSD, 3D audio, and ray tracing.

name: Google Nest Mini
description: The latest Google Nest Mini model with Google Assistant built-in, improved sound quality, and hands-free voice control.

name: MacBook Pro
description: The latest MacBook Pro model with a 16-inch Retina display, Touch Bar, and the Apple M1 chip.

name: Tesla Model 3
description: The latest Tesla Model 3 model with a range of up to 358 miles, 0-60 mph acceleration in 3.2 seconds, and autopilot advanced safety and convenience features.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2
description: The latest DJI Mavic Air 2 model with 4K camera, 3-axis gimbal, 34 minutes flight time and 8km 1080p video transmission.
